email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 02/21/2001 03:57 PM --------------------------- "George Richards" <cbpres@austin.rr.com> on 02/21/2001 01:10:33 PM Please respond to <cbpres@austin.rr.com> To: "Keith Holst" <kholst@enron.com>, "Phillip Allen" <pallen@enron.com> cc: "Larry Lewter" <LLEWTER@austin.rr.com> Subject: Weekly Status Meeting Phillip and Keith, this cold of mine is getting the better of me. Would it be possible to reschedule our meeting for tomorrow? If so, please reply to this e-mail with a time. I am open all day, but just need to get some rest this afternoon. George W. Richards Creekside Builders, LLC
